keys.string: Danny how come I always see you inside the bathroom?
And why are you always in a ninja outfit?
So you don’t see me in the bathroom.
Ok. But I’m here seeing and talking to you.
No one said that being a ninja was easy. If I wore camo no one would notice me, I would just blend right in.
Aren’t ninja’s supposed to blend into their surroundings?

ArrayOfString.string: [Player][Dialog]Danny how come I always see you inside the bathroom?
[Player][Dialog]And why are you always in a ninja outfit?
[Danny][Dialog]So you don’t see me in the bathroom.
[Player][Dialog]Ok. But I’m here seeing and talking to you.
[Danny][Dialog]No one said that being a ninja was easy. If I wore camo no one would notice me, I would just blend right in.
[Narrator][Dialog]Aren’t ninja’s supposed to blend into their surroundings?
